author: Ingrid Melander and Emmanuel Jarry
description: A leading French conservative accused President Emmanuel Macron of "dynamiting" the political landscape on Tuesday as he put together a government that is expected to include former rivals on both left and right.
title: France's Macron to name ministers Wednesday as rivals fear 'dynamiting'

author: Ellen Nakashima, Craig Timberg, Ellen Nakashima, Craig Timberg
description: One former employee said the hacking tool was so powerful it was like “fishing with dynamite.”
title: NSA officials worried about the day its potent hacking tool would get loose. Then it did.
